description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) elevation of privilege vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-21405:

1. Download and apply the KB5034763 update for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update resolves the vulnerability by properly securing sensitive data storage in memory, mitigating potential attacks that could lead to elevated privileges.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)
  - For other versions: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765), [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766), [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows versions.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
